dt: {bc}to scatter or sow (seed or something similar) over a {a_link|broad} area

dt.t: A man who—make no mistake—cares deeply, but doesn't feel the need to {wi}broadcast{/wi} it.

dt: {bc}to send out or transmit (something, such as a program) by means of radio or television or by streaming over the Internet

dt.t: an event being {wi}broadcast{/wi} live on television
Poker was first {wi}broadcast{/wi} on television in 1993, but it wasn't until 2002 that the game became watchable.
… part of a campaign to get people to go online to a fashion show that was {wi}broadcast{/wi} live over the Internet.
Among the group's claims to fame is that it was the first band to {wi}broadcast{/wi} live over the Internet.

dt: {bc}to speak or perform on a broadcast program

shortdef: to scatter or sow (seed or something similar) over a broad area
to send out or transmit (something, such as a program) by means of radio or television or by streaming over the Internet

dt: {bc}a program that is broadcast on radio or television or over the Internet
{bc}the act of transmitting sound or images by radio or television

dt.t: Less than two years ago, the {wi}broadcast{/wi} of digital television—from transmitter tower to home antenna—was considered to be science fiction.

dt: {bc}a casting or scattering in all directions (as of seed from the hand in sowing)

dt.t: … those of us who oppose the wanton {wi}broadcast{/wi} of pesticides and inorganic fertilizers on lawn and garden …

shortdef: a program that is broadcast on radio or television or over the Internet
the act of transmitting sound or images by radio or television
a casting or scattering in all directions (as of seed from the hand in sowing)

dt: {bc}made public by means of radio or television
{bc}of or relating to radio or television {a_link|broadcasting}

shortdef: cast or scattered in all directions
made public by means of radio or television
of or relating to radio or television broadcasting
to or over a broad area

dt: {bc}a booth from which a radio broadcast is made

dt.t: Our seats at the baseball game were next to the {it}broadcast booth{/it}.

shortdef: a booth from which a radio broadcast is made

dt: {bc}journalism that is in the field of radio or television broadcasting rather than print

dt.t: She wants to have a career in {it}broadcast journalism{/it}.

shortdef: journalism that is in the field of radio or television broadcasting rather than print

dt: {bc}a television broadcasting system in which satellite transmissions are received by a dish antenna at the viewing location (such as a home)

shortdef: a television broadcasting system in which satellite transmissions are received by a dish antenna at the viewing location (such as a home) —called also satellite, satellite television
